text:
Guillermo Gets Andy Ruiz Jr. Ready for the Big Fight

03:53 | 12.05.19 | TV-14 | CC

Saturday night is the rematch between heavyweight boxers Andy Ruiz Jr. and Anthony Joshua. Ruiz won the first fight in a major upset. America fell immediately in love with him, and we did too. So in preparation for this big event, we sent our own heavyweight Guillermo to Team Ruiz Training Camp to get the champ ready with a game of 'Truth or Punch?'
title: Jimmy Kimmel Live!
